<style>
.fs-service-icon {

}

}
.fs-slider_v2_5 .fs-entry-container {

}
.fs-wrapper div.fs-text-container .fs-entry-title,
div.fs-detail-title {

.fs-text-product,

  font-family: Poppins, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: normal;
  font-size: 14px;
}
.fs-wrapper div.fs-text-container * {
  color: #ffffff;
}
.fs-wrapper div.fs-text-container {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.605);
  margin: 0px;
}
div.fs-entry-date {
  display: none;
}
div.fs-entry-title {
  display: none;
}
.fs-slider_v2_5 .fs-wrapper div.fs-timeline-entry {
  margin: 0px;
}
#fs-post-info {
  display: none;
}
.fs-shopify-add-cart.fs-shopify-add-cart-container {
    max-width: fit-content !important;
    padding: 14px 20px;
    border-radius: 60px;
    font-weight: 500;
    text-transform: none !important;
    color: #ffffff !important;
    font-size: 11px !important;
}
.fs-add-to-cart-enabled .fs-view a {

}

    text-transform: none;

}

}

    max-width: fit-content !important;

}
.fs-add-to-cart-enabled .fs-view {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column-reverse;
}
.fs-product-price {
    color: #868686;
    font-size: 11px;
}
#fs-detail-branding, a#fs-detail-branding, a#fs-detail-branding img, .fs-add-to-cart-enabled .fs-buy-now-branding {

}
a.fs-buy-button {
    padding: 14px 28px !important;
    text-decoration: none !important;

    color: #ffffff !important;
    border-radius: 60px;
    width: fit-content !important;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {

}
#fs-detail-title {
    width: 100%;

    margin: 0 auto;
margin-bottom: 30px;
}
a.fs-buy-button.fs-medium-text.fs-cancel-purchase::after {
    position: absolute;

    font-family: 'Material Symbols Outlined';
    top: 12%;

}

settings.title: TLF APP
settings.text: Download Our app for exclusive VIP early access, special discounts, and limited edition drops.

settings.title: Buy Now Pay Later
settings.text: We have chosen multiple partners so you can shop and pay later. It's simple and easy.

settings.title: TLF REWARDS
settings.text: As a rewards member, you'll get closer to earning exclusive rewards every time you shop.

MORE THAN YOUR BEST WORKOUT CLOTHING

The TLF community is devoted to unlocking potential through conditioning and the things we do today to prepare for tomorrow. When it comes to performing at your max, there should be no obstacles – least of all your workout clothes. So everything about the gym clothes and accessories we design for you has your progress and the best results in mind. We want you to have the most comfortable gym hoodies, the most supportive seamless leggings and the most innovatively designed workout shirts that are made to move when it matters most.

Game-changing workout clothing. It’s not just in the designs, it’s in the people who wear them.
